title: You're Under Arrest (DVD 480p) (NakamaSub)
description:

Notes : This is not a new version with new subtitles. This is simply a re-encode of all episode for people who have not enough HDD space. That mean smaller files with good quality because of the slow encode.

Format : DVD 480p, BD 720p (Movie), TV 432p (Mini)
Audio : Japanese
Subs : English (All credits goes to the team that did them, their names will be on the file name.)

Infos available on the site.

Content :
1) You're under arrest OVA (4 ep.)
2) You're under arrest TV (47 ep. + 1 SP)
3) You're under arrest MINI-SPECIAL (The specials actually contain 20 episodes of 8 min and one episode of 24 min. The 20 episodes were merged into 5 episodes by AniMecha. The one 24 min episode is the SP of season one. Those are in 432p)
4) You're under arrest - THE MOVIE
5) You're under arrest - Fast & Furious (26 ep.)
6) You're under arrest - No mercy (SP)
7) You're under arrest - Full Throttle (24 ep.)
